description: Foundation Summary Data Information.  Intended for use in report summary in AME SVG
title: FoundationData

ConcreteCompressiveStrength_psi.description: Foundation COncrete compressive strength f'c in psi

AllowableSoilBearingCap_IndividualSpread.description: The allowable soil bearing capacity for individual spreadFootings

AllowableSoilBearingCap_Continuoustg_psf.description: The allowable soil bearing capacity for continuous strip footings

DepthToBearingStratum_ft.description: The depth to bearing stratum in ft

MinEmbedmentIntoBearingStratum_ft.description: The min depth into bearing stratum in ft usually dictated by geotech

LengthOfNeglectedSkinFriction_ft.description: The length to neglect in skin friction calcs

EndBearingPressure_psf.description: The allowable bearing pressure at the end of the drilled pier in psf

SkinFriction_psf.description: The soil resistance in gravity loading for skin friction in psf

UpliftSkinFriction_psf.description: The soil resistance in uplift loading for skin friction in psf

LengthOfUpliftOnSkin_ft.description: The length used forskin friction uplift in ft
